about_the_game:
Overview

A couple years have passed since you moved out from your family's house. A few notes and letters you recently found prompt you to visit them. Unbeknownst to you, this is part of his plan...

Lost Souls is an atmospheric walking simulator in which you encounter a plethora of paranormal creatures, alongside the traps and mind games that serve as the remnants of the house's owner. Set in a middle-class house deep within dense forest vegetation, you'll unveil unsettling secrets through its hidden passages, trap doors, and remains of the terrible experiments performed inside. The game's pleasing visuals and realistic camera movement create an exciting, immersive experience for you to get sucked into.

WARNING


Epilepsy warning; game includes rapidly flashing lights.
Beware game does not save
~50 minutes long

content_descriptors.notes: this game contains content which maybe sensitive to anyone dealing with a suicide or a loss of someone

short_description: Lost souls is a short first-person indie horror game where you solve puzzles, encounter creepy scares, and uncover the tragedy that befell your family, all in a sinister yet compelling atmosphere which traps you in the home of the Ambrus.
